item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 to exit 28,make right onto NH 49 toward Waterville Valley,when just getting to Waterville Valley,make a left onto Tripoli Road at the sign flashing how fast you are going.Stay to the right on Tripoli Road,do not go to the ski area,when the pavement ends, go 1.2 miles past Mount Osceola parking lot,make left into the Mount Tecumseh Trail parking lot.We will be hiking on the Mount Tecumseh Trail to the summit of Mt.Tecumseh (4003').Good views from the ridge.This is a moderate hike. 6.2 miles round trip, 7 hours estimated time.------Steve------As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness,and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: TECUMSEH VIA TRIPOLI ROAD
